overview: THE COLDEST DISH is a dramatic comedy about two complete opposite ethnic girls desperately seeking different types of love; Romantic love and parental love. Also, most importantly, they want their vengeance on the ones who hurt them the most. Living in the same city, but in completely different mental worlds. They experience financial and racial struggles, drug and alcohol abuse, mental abuse from lovers and parents, as well as sibling rivalry in the LGBT community. This story speaks to the African American and Middle Eastern community as our lead actors come from these cultures, but it also speaks to all women and men around us.
title: The Coldest Dish
